ALB.Description:
Country Name: Albania
Country Code: ALB
Category: CPD

Country Name: Albania
Country Code: ALB

The summary7 of the previous country programme’s performance concluded that 
UNDP support to development remains highly relevant in Albania.

The summary7 of the previous country programme’s performance concluded that 
UNDP support to development remains highly relevant in Albania.

With Albania positioning itself as a unifying actor for regional cooperation, security
and stability, and taking the initial steps to establish the national disaster risk management 
system as a requirement to join the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism, UNDP will 
continue to promote knowledge-sharing and relevant practices across the subregion.

With Albania positioning itself as a unifying actor for regional cooperation, security
and stability, and taking the initial steps to establish the national disaster risk management 
system as a requirement to join the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism, UNDP will 
continue to promote knowledge-sharing and relevant practices across the subregion.

and stability, and taking the initial steps to establish the national disaster risk management 
system as a requirement to join the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism, UNDP will 
continue to promote knowledge-sharing and relevant practices across the subregion.

ALB.Object: the european union civil protection mechanism
ALB.Description:
With Albania positioning itself as a unifying actor for regional cooperation, security
and stability, and taking the initial steps to establish the national disaster risk management 
system as a requirement to join the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism, UNDP will 
continue to promote knowledge-sharing and relevant practices across the subregion.

With Albania positioning itself as a unifying actor for regional cooperation, security
and stability, and taking the initial steps to establish the national disaster risk management 
system as a requirement to join the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism, UNDP will 
continue to promote knowledge-sharing and relevant practices across the subregion.

The report of the United Nations mainstreaming, acceleration and policy support 
mission to Albania and the United Nations country team reached consensus on three highly 
effective solutions for policy and programming to accelerate progress towards European 
Union accession and achieve the Sustainable Development Goals: (a) human capital 
development and social inclusion; (b) sustainable, resilient and green economic growth and 
resource management; (c) effective, people-centred governance, human rights, rule of law 
and gender equality.

The report of the United Nations mainstreaming, acceleration and policy support

effective solutions for policy and programming to accelerate progress towards European 
Union accession and achieve the Sustainable Development Goals: (a) human capital 
development and social inclusion; (b) sustainable, resilient and green economic growth and 
resource management; (c) effective, people-centred governance, human rights, rule of law 
and gender equality.

resource management; (c) effective, people-centred governance, human rights, rule of law

Natural or man-made hazards, with insufficient institutional 
and local preparedness to respond, can impact the ability of UNDP to support Albania in 
delivering its development priorities.

UNDP will foster a citizencentred, gender-sensitive, inclusive approach, while further developing institutional
capacities in policymaking and implementation, promoting a culture of participation and 
dialogue for development, and increasing transparency, integrity and accountability.

UNDP will foster a citizencentred, gender-sensitive, inclusive approach, while further developing institutional

dialogue for development, and increasing transparency, integrity and accountability.

UNDP will continue to work towards ending all forms of 
domestic, sexual and gender-based violence and unfavourable social norms and gender 
stereotypes, supporting coordinated referral mechanisms and integrated services, safe 
accommodation and accessible emergency and specialized support.

United Nations.Description:
Drawing on 
its reputation as a United Nations system “integrator” for the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable 
Development and trusted impartial partner, UNDP will continue to liaise with the 
Government, donors and international institutions to mobilize financing to support economic 
transformation and eradication of multidimensional poverty; and establish systems that 
address risks, disasters and social injustice within the Sustainable Development Goals.

its reputation as a United Nations system “integrator” for the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable

Government, donors and international institutions to mobilize financing to support economic 
transformation and eradication of multidimensional poverty; and establish systems that 
address risks, disasters and social injustice within the Sustainable Development Goals.

UNDP.Object: the western balkan regional economic area
UNDP.Description:
UNDP 
will focus on integrated solutions that address cross-cutting problems, i.e., identifying naturebased solutions that support the transition to a clean green economy, promote ecotourism and 
create new jobs in competitive sectors within the Western Balkan Regional Economic Area.

UNDP 
will focus on integrated solutions that address cross-cutting problems, i.e., identifying naturebased solutions that support the transition to a clean green economy, promote ecotourism and 
create new jobs in competitive sectors within the Western Balkan Regional Economic Area.

UNDP will work on the quality of services and rule of law, in 
close collaboration with United Nations partners.

UNDP will work on the quality of services and rule of law, in 
close collaboration with United Nations partners.

With Albania positioning itself as a unifying actor for regional cooperation, security
and stability, and taking the initial steps to establish the national disaster risk management 
system as a requirement to join the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism, UNDP will 
continue to promote knowledge-sharing and relevant practices across the subregion.

With Albania positioning itself as a unifying actor for regional cooperation, security
and stability, and taking the initial steps to establish the national disaster risk management 
system as a requirement to join the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism, UNDP will 
continue to promote knowledge-sharing and relevant practices across the subregion.

To the 
extent possible, UNDP will promote South-South and triangular cooperation in support of 
these efforts.

To the 
extent possible, UNDP will promote South-South and triangular cooperation in support of 
these efforts.

In addition, it is aligned with the UNDP Strategic 
Plan and contributes to different European Union acquis chapters.

In addition, it is aligned with the UNDP Strategic 
Plan and contributes to different European Union acquis chapters.

socioeconomic recovery plan.

will focus on integrated solutions that address cross-cutting problems, i.e., identifying naturebased solutions that support the transition to a clean green economy, promote ecotourism and 
create new jobs in competitive sectors within the Western Balkan Regional Economic Area.

the European Union Civil Protection Mech.Object: the european union civil protection mechanism
the European Union Civil Protection Mech.Description:
With Albania positioning itself as a unifying actor for regional cooperation, security
and stability, and taking the initial steps to establish the national disaster risk management 
system as a requirement to join the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism, UNDP will 
continue to promote knowledge-sharing and relevant practices across the subregion.

With Albania positioning itself as a unifying actor for regional cooperation, security
and stability, and taking the initial steps to establish the national disaster risk management 
system as a requirement to join the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism, UNDP will 
continue to promote knowledge-sharing and relevant practices across the subregion.

South-South.Description:
To the 
extent possible, UNDP will promote South-South and triangular cooperation in support of 
these efforts.

To the 
extent possible, UNDP will promote South-South and triangular cooperation in support of 
these efforts.

The Sustainable Development Goal.Description:
Drawing on 
its reputation as a United Nations system “integrator” for the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable 
Development and trusted impartial partner, UNDP will continue to liaise with the 
Government, donors and international institutions to mobilize financing to support economic 
transformation and eradication of multidimensional poverty; and establish systems that 
address risks, disasters and social injustice within the Sustainable Development Goals.

Government, donors and international institutions to mobilize financing to support economic 
transformation and eradication of multidimensional poverty; and establish systems that 
address risks, disasters and social injustice within the Sustainable Development Goals.

Economic growth is too low to converge with European Union living standards and 
achieve the Sustainable Development Goals.

Economic growth is too low to converge with European Union living standards and 
achieve the Sustainable Development Goals.

The report of the United Nations mainstreaming, acceleration and policy support 
mission to Albania and the United Nations country team reached consensus on three highly 
effective solutions for policy and programming to accelerate progress towards European 
Union accession and achieve the Sustainable Development Goals: (a) human capital 
development and social inclusion; (b) sustainable, resilient and green economic growth and 
resource management; (c) effective, people-centred governance, human rights, rule of law 
and gender equality.

the National Public Administration Refor.Object: the national public administration reform strategy
the National Public Administration Refor.Description:
UNDP will broaden partnerships for a stronger good governance framework, in 
line with the National Public Administration Reform Strategy.

line with the National Public Administration Reform Strategy.

This country programme document (CPD) outlines UNDP’s contributions to national 
results and serves as the primary unit of accountability to the Executive Board for results 
alignment and resources assigned to the programme at country level.
